title: Echoes in Freestone
creator_credit: John M. Bale, Ray Barnes and Tasfilm Productions
brief_description: Using sounds from the past, over pictures of the present, the film glimpses a man’s life in pioneering days. Set in the historic town of Richmond, Tasmania, the film shows some of the classic colonial Georgian houses and churches, many of which date from the early days.
